channel.title: Privacy and technology tools
channel.description:
Reading an article about Apple's data transmission and collection once again has me thinking about my privacy. It is so multi-layered: Chat, location, tracking on the web, Government access to tracking information.
We want Openness yet privacy control. I think that is a huge issue that we all struggle with.
While my post is not specifically about this apple situation, here is the post for reference and education - https://sneak.berlin/20201112/your-computer-isnt-yours/
